member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HdrToneMapEffect
member.summary: Tonemaps a source image based on starting and final luminance data.

remarks.p: The Turbulence effect computes adjusts the maximum luminance of the source image to fit within the maximum output luminance supported. Input and output luminance values are specified in nits. Note that the color space of the image is assumed to be scRGB.
